titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to encourage the development and use of DISARM antimicrobial drugs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Developing an Innovative Strategy for Antimicrobial Resistant Microorganisms Act of 2018 or the DISARM Act of 2018
This bill requires additional payment under Medicare's inpatient prospective payment system for services that involve certain antimicrobial drugs, in accordance with specified limitations.
